  • Method Details

    • closestFood

      public abstract Path closestFood()
      Returns the path to the closest food. If there are more than one path that is the same distance, this method chooses the path that leads to more food. If there are multiple paths that are the same distance and have the same amount of food, choose path randomly.
      Returns:
      Path object containing the best path to food

    • closestWater

      public abstract Path closestWater()
      Returns the path to the closest water. If there are more than one path that is the same distance, this method chooses the path that leads to more water. If there are multiple paths that are the same distance and have the same amount of water, choose path randomly.
      Returns:
      Path object containing the best path to water

    • closestGold

      public abstract Path closestGold()
      Returns the path to the closest gold. If there are more than one path that is the same distance, this method chooses the path that leads to more gold. If there are multiple paths that are the same distance and have the same amount of gold, choose path randomly.
      Returns:
      Path object containing the best path to gold

    • easiestPath

      public Path easiestPath()
      Returns a path in the direction of east that costs the least overall. The path will only be one square long
      Returns:
      Path object containing the easiest path

    • setEasiestSquares

      protected abstract void setEasiestSquares()
      Stores the squares that are only one square away from the player for later evaluation to determine which square has the least cost

    • hasFood

      protected boolean hasFood(MapSquare square)

      protected boolean hasWater(MapSquare square)

      protected boolean hasGold(MapSquare square)

    • getVisibleSquares

      public abstract List<MapSquare> getVisibleSquares(GameMap map, Player player)
      Retrieves all visible squares
      Parameters:
      map - The map of the entire game
      player - The player in the game
      Returns:
      List of map squares visible the the player
